div.div: attrd stores queue of failed nodes which require action

switch.text: attrd stores queue of failed nodes which require action

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 176px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: polls attrd queue and processes failed nodes

div.div: Pacemaker fences failed compute node then invokes fence_compute as secondary fencing agent
